org.aludratest.service.gui.web.selenium
Class ProxyPool

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.service.gui.web.selenium.ProxyPool

public class ProxyPool
extends Object

Creates and manages a pool of AuthenticatingHttpProxy instances using an ObjectPool.

Author:
Volker Bergmann

Constructor Summary
ProxyPool(String targetHost, int targetPortCfg, int firstLocalPort, int poolSize)
          Creates a pool of proxies which forward all calls to the same target server and port, but each one listening on a different local port.
 
Method Summary
 AuthenticatingHttpProxy acquire()
          Acquires a proxy from the pool for exclusive use by a single client, waiting if necessary.
 void release(AuthenticatingHttpProxy proxy)
          Puts back a used proxy into the pool.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

ProxyPool

public ProxyPool(String targetHost,
                 int targetPortCfg,
                 int firstLocalPort,
                 int poolSize)
Creates a pool of proxies which forward all calls to the same target server and port, but each one listening on a different local port. The used local port numbers begin with 'firstLocalPort' (e.g. 8000) and use the following port numbers (e.g. 8001, 8002, ...)

Parameters:
targetHost - the target host
targetPortCfg - the configured target port
firstLocalPort - the first local port to be opened by the proxies
poolSize - The size of the pool.
Method Detail

acquire

public AuthenticatingHttpProxy acquire()
                                throws InterruptedException
Acquires a proxy from the pool for exclusive use by a single client, waiting if necessary.

Returns:
a new proxy from the pool
Throws:
InterruptedException - if the wait has been interrupted

release

public void release(AuthenticatingHttpProxy proxy)
Puts back a used proxy into the pool. The client has to call this to put its proxy back to the pool after using it.

Parameters:
proxy - The proxy to release
